data.prayer: Father, move the 3,041 believers in the state of Srednje-Banatski to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Srednje-Banatski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Srednje-Banatski, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Srednje-Banatski, Serbia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Srednje-Banatski, Serbia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Srednje-Banatski to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, help every believer in Srednje-Banatski, Serbia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the state of Srednje-Banatski, Serbia has a population of 423,600.

We estimate Srednje-Banatski has 3,041 people who might know Jesus, 332,520 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 88,038 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: There are 423,600 people living in the state of Srednje-Banatski. Only about 3,041 might be believers.
